Body:
body = '{"user": "alice", "scope": ["files"], "client_id": "abc"}'
responses.add(responses.POST, 'https://server/v1/verify', body=body,
    content_type='application/json')
add_jwks_response()
self.assertRaises(fxa.errors.ScopeMismatchError, self.client.verify_token,
    token='1234', scope='readinglist')
responses.activate
